PSCT.Base: Target 1 Fusion Monster on the field or in either GY; return it to the Extra Deck, then you can Special Summon 1 "Fallen of Albaz" from your GY to your field and 1 monster from your opponent's GY to their field. You can only activate 1 "Light of the Branded" per turn.
